item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 1, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple is open sourcing Swift Build (242 points | 87 comments)

10. Archivists work to save disappearing data.gov datasets (172 points | 64 comments)
11. National Science Foundation freezes payments in response to executive orders (11 points | discuss)
12. New California bill might block the "AI did it" defense in civil cases (32 points | 33 comments)
13. Video: Why this simple ring was so difficult to make [video] (6 points | discuss)
14. Smart fabric heats up under the sun (12 points | 10 comments)

22. Burrows–Wheeler Transform (11 points | discuss)
23. 3D scene reconstruction in adverse weather conditions via Gaussian splatting (33 points | 8 comments)

26. In Zig, what's a writer? (114 points | 45 comments)
27. Blogging on Paper (2017) (22 points | 10 comments)
28. USAID website has been taken down (39 points | 5 comments)
29. It's OK to hardcode feature flags (81 points | 64 comments)
30. Have Gemini stage and write commit messages for you (7 points | 5 comments)
